Features: Keyless Start,  Leather Upholstery, electric seat, camera for park distance control, cruise control, and much much more!
Don't miss out! Visit us Today!

Service Plan - 5 years or 90,000km (whichever occurs first)
Service Plan Intervals - Every 15,000km
Warranty - 4 years or 120,000km (whichever occurs first)

We offer a range of Ford specific EXTENDED as well as NEW Warranties and Service Plans. With such a variety, you are guaranteed to find a Warranty and Service Plan that will suit your individual needs as a motorist. For more information on all the above offers and specials, contact our Finance and Insurance Manager, Arianna Tzircalle on (012) 8042369 or via email at arianna@auriniaford.co.za
